LanguageData.AnomalyPatch_AtmosphericHeaterFactor: Disable "Need warm clothes" alert with atmospheric heater
LanguageData.AnomalyPatch_BioferriteHarvesterMultiple: Show total bioferrite contained with multiple harvesters selected
LanguageData.AnomalyPatch_CharacterHighlighting: Show silhouettes even in unnatural darkness
LanguageData.AnomalyPatch_DangerousActivityLevels: Show highest obelisk activity level in multiple alert
LanguageData.AnomalyPatch_DeathPallResurrectionSound: Death pall resurrection messages are silent
LanguageData.AnomalyPatch_DevourerWaterAssaultFix: Void provocation can silently fail on devourer water assault
LanguageData.AnomalyPatch_DontBlockDoors: Don't perform work in a containment cell doorway
LanguageData.AnomalyPatch_FoodPriority: Prioritize twisted meat for caravaning ghouls and animals
LanguageData.AnomalyPatch_GhoulHunting: Allow ghouls to hunt prey on their own
LanguageData.AnomalyPatch_HorrorMusic: Pit gates don't cause horror/combat music to play unless you're in them
LanguageData.AnomalyPatch_LabyrinthClosing: Forbid items from the labyrinth outside the home area
LanguageData.AnomalyPatch_NoProjectNoStudy: Don't do dark study without an anomaly research project active
LanguageData.AnomalyPatch_PsychicRitualZoning: Adhere to zone restrictions while preparing for psychic rituals
LanguageData.AnomalyPatch_RitualDialogSorting: Sort pawns by psychic sensitivity in psychic ritual dialog
LanguageData.AnomalyPatch_StudyAndSuppressByDefault: Enable study and suppression of entities by default
LanguageData.AnomalyPatch_ForbidMonolithCorpses: Automatically forbid corpses spawned around monolith
LanguageData.AnomalyPatch_StopSuppression: Allow pawns to stop suppressing obelisk activity before target level reached
LanguageData.AnomalyPatch_CreepJoinerLove: Allow creepjoiners to romance non-creepjoiners and vice versa
LanguageData.AnomalyPatch_UnnaturalDarknessMapFix: Certain Anomaly incidents can generate using threat points from one map but spawn on another
LanguageData.AnomalyPatch_DeadGhoulsInColonistBar: Show ghouls in colonist bar even while dead or in a caravan
LanguageData.AnomalyPatch_InhumanPregnancyAttitude: Inhumanized pawns don't care when their pregnancy is terminated
LanguageData.AnomalyPatch_RitualTargetsDontNeedRescue: Suppress "Colonist needs rescue" alert for psychic ritual targets
LanguageData.AnomalyPatch_AvoidDreadLeather: Pawns avoid dread leather apparel if they don't like it
LanguageData.AnomalyPatch_CreepjoinerBodyTypeFix: Female creepjoiners erroneously have male body type
LanguageData.AnomalyPatch_DontBlockPrisonDoors: Also don't perform work in a prison doorway
LanguageData.AnomalyPatch_ExtractBioferriteByDefault: Enable manual bioferrite extraction on entities by default when no bioferrite extractor exists
